answers.answer: With my previous two the two week appointments were no different than the monthly appointments for the most part.I can't remember which week he did the strep b swab but it was the same week he started checking dilation...I think that was about the time the aappointments became weekly. Congratulations and good luck with the gb test!
I'm doing 2 week app now . Just the usual weight , check urine , measure your uterus . And my midwife always just ask me if I have any questions

question: So I am officially in my third trimester and wonder what I can expect when I start going to the doctor every 2 weeks.  I go the 20th to get the gestational diabetes test and then after that I'm gonna be going every 2 weeks after that.I'm in the third trimester.Woohoo!!!
title: Third trimester
